archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.5.3: Key components of all new systems should be tested, in separate staging environments, before being installed in the live environment, including application software packages, system software, hardware, communications services and environmental facilities (e.g. air conditioning and backup power supplies).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
